(2005) |Next single = "[[The Girl's A Straight-Up Hustler|The Girl's a Straight-Up Hustler]]"
(2006) }} "'''Circles'''" is the first single off the [[All Time Low]] album ''[[The Party Scene]]''. It is their first ever released single with a music video and was recorded on the [[Emerald Moon Records|Emerald Moon Record Label]]. ==Music video== This is the first music video by All Time Low and was shot at the Sheffield Institute. In the video you see the band performing and horsing around on a couch. ==Song meaning== The song is about a relationship that has ended, but the guy still wants to be with the girl. This song is possibly written about one of Alex Gaskarth's girlfriends. {{All Time Low}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Circles (All Time Low Song)}} [[Category:2005 singles]] {{2000s-song-stub}}
